snippet: The Kremlin’s strategy emerged haphazardly as an emotional President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia acted out of what officials called a deep sense of betrayal and grievance.
abstract: Examination of events surrounding political implosion in Ukraine reveals that Russia's strategy emerged haphazardly and in secret, as an emotional Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin acted out of a deep sense of betrayal and grievance; decisions, particularly the one to invade Crimea, have unleashed wave of nationalistic fervor for peninsula's reunification with Russia that the Kremlin has so far proved unwilling, or unable, to tamp down.
lead_paragraph: The Kremlin’s strategy emerged haphazardly as an emotional President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia acted out of what officials called a deep sense of betrayal and grievance.

headline.main: Russia’s Move Into Ukraine Said to Be Born in Shadows
headline.print_headline: Move Into Ukraine Said to Be Born in Shadows
